msbt.message: Today's Halloween! Did you get a big bowl of candy ready for me like you were supposed to, ?
Y'know what today is? That's right! It's Halloween! I gotta get enough candy to last me the rest of the year.Never mind a candy jar—I'm gonna need a whole candy basement!
Halloween is here! Hallo-WHEEEE! I'm so excited to see everyone's costumes. This is gonna be fun!
It's almost time for trick-or-treating. I'm all set! Just gotta change into my costume, !
Sweet, sweet candy Oh, whoops! I mean, it's almost time to go trick- or-treating, .
Not long now until trick-or-treats! I'm gonna scare so many folks, a huh huh huh, .
Hey! Y'know what I just saw? Someone's been putting out Halloween decorations!That's gonna REALLY help me remember what month it is. It's harder than you think, !

Lotta Halloween decorations popping up around here lately. It's kinda cool!What do you think of the idea that ghosts put them out while we're not watching?It's a scary thought, and that's what Halloween's all about!
Seein' the Halloween stuff all over sure is gettin' me ready for the big night!I mean, as much as I ever can be. Just gotta remember it's not all about the scares—there's candy too!
Did I wake up this morning in a pumpkin patch, or are we still on ? It's never been more Halloween-y around here, that's for sure! Candy haul, here I come!
